message.body: Hello!
Hey what's up :)
Just made dinner. Baked fish in Thai peanut sauce. 90% homemade. :-)
Nice sounds delicious! I'm about to cook dinner too
What are you having?
Broccoli and beef!
Yum.
How have you been
Meh. Glad it's Friday. I didn't sleep enough this week.
I feel you, it was finals week for me
Where and what are you studying?
University of California. I'm an italian major but I am trying out black studies to see if I want to double
Interesting. It's worth trying out different fields you're interested in. I majored in psychology and minored in biology at Syracuse, but I also took a b
unch of history and linguistics classes, and also ja studiowalem jezyk polski, ale tez nie mowie biegle.

Well I need another major because speaking Italian won't pay the bills haha. A lot of my friends are doing Bio. Smarties :P I took a ling class and the professor was horribly boring. And is that Polish?
Yup. I said, "I studied Polish, but I still don't speak fluently." I wouldn't worry too much about the marketability of Italian. I think most employers,
unless you're going into a specific specialty, will look at any degree as a sign that you can commit and do work. A second major may be a good call if yo
u're looking to impress people, but you should choose it based on what interests you. :-)
Which UC, by the way? I have a cousin who went to UCSD.
Well I'm an out of state student so I also want to get the most I can out of these loans and plus black studies so far is pretty neat. And I go to UCSB :)
